text: Va ʙaroi onon, ki murtakiʙi ʙadiho savand, cazoi har kori ʙade ʙa andozai on xohad ʙud va ononro dar ruzi qijomat xori faro xohad girift. Kase onhoro az azoʙi Alloh nigah namedorad, cunon savand, ki gujo rujason ʙo porahoe az saʙi torik pusida sudaast. Inho ahli cahannamand va covidona dar on hastand
